A car travels at an average speed of 60 miles per hour for 3.5 hours. How far does it travel in total?
A rectangular garden has a perimeter of 60 meters. If the length of the garden is twice its width, what is the area of the garden?
Sarah bought a laptop for $1200. The sales tax was 8.5%. What was the total amount she paid for the laptop, including tax?
What is the next number in the sequence: 2, 5, 10, 17, 26, ?
John can build a fence in 10 hours. Mike can build the same fence in 15 hours. If they work together, how many hours will it take them to build the fence?
Pipe A can fill an empty water tank in 3 hours. Pipe B can fill the same empty tank in 5 hours. If both pipes are opened simultaneously, how many hours will it take to fill the tank completely?
A rectangular swimming pool is 20 meters long and 10 meters wide. It is surrounded by a uniform concrete deck that is 1.5 meters wide on all sides. What is the total area of the concrete deck?
How many distinct permutations can be made from the letters of the word "MATHEMATICS"?
A bag contains 8 red balls, 5 blue balls, and 7 green balls. If one ball is chosen at random, what is the probability that the chosen ball is neither red nor green?
A jacket originally costs $120. During a sale, it is discounted by 20%. An additional 15% discount is then applied to the sale price. What is the final price of the jacket after both discounts?

A rectangular garden has a perimeter of 48 meters. If its length is 4 meters greater than its width, what is the area of the garden in square meters?

In how many distinct ways can the letters of the word 'MISSISSIPPI' be arranged?

A rectangular garden has a perimeter of 60 meters. If the length is twice its width, what is the area of the garden in square meters?

A sequence starts with 2, 5, 10, 17, 26... What is the next number in the sequence?
